synopsis.text: In a post-apocalyptic near future, a nuclear disaster has opened a gateway between Earth and Hell, unleashing dangerous demons. Kento, an elementary school student, discovers a small, friendly daemon named Anna amidst the chaos. Forming a close bond, the two embark on a perilous journey across Japan to find Kento's mother, who sacrificed herself to protect him from a vicious bounty hunter. Along the way, Kento and Anna learn to rely on each other while confronting the harsh new world order and supernatural forces that threaten humanity's survival. Though the road ahead is uncertain, Kento and Anna share an unbreakable friendship to light their way through the darkness.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
